meta.description: Adds 7 Origins in an RPG Feel
meta.long_description:
# **RPG Origins**

### 7 origins in the style of an RPG

These are not classes! Classes do not have downsides, but my origins do.

Origins:

![The Knight: Always takes half a heart less damage | Deals 10% more damage | Starts with a shield | Gets Hungry Faster](https://i.postimg.cc/Fzg7BpNk/Knight.png)
![The Archer: Extra Ranged Damage | "Quiver that has 5 slots to hold items (non-arrows drop on death) | Can craft 8 arrows instead of 4 when near a fletching table | 3 fewer hears | Half attack damage when not using a projectile](https://i.postimg.cc/3NvpZT8r/Archer.png)
![The Cleric: Permanent hero of the village | Regeneration, speed, jump boost, and strength last 50% longer | Heal pool ability (primary Button) | Can't get bad omen | 3 fewer hearts](https://i.postimg.cc/ZRq7mgXZ/Cleric.png)
![The Mage: Immune to poison, weakness, and slowness | Ability to walk on water while holding a heart of the sea | Fireball spell (Primary Button) | Less attack damage | 3 fewer heats](https://i.postimg.cc/Z51CrZQR/Mage.png)
![The Bard | 1.19+ Only: Can do special things with goat horns, each one is different | Starts with a goat horn | Runs faster when at low health | Gets hungry faster | Gains less XP](https://i.postimg.cc/NFdPw9nQ/Bard.png)
![The Thief: Permanent swiftness I | Invisible to players and mobs while crouching, can't deal damage during and 3 seconds after crouching | When killing a villager you steal 3 emeralds | Starts a raid when they kill an iron golem | 2 fewer hearts | Can't use a shield](https://i.postimg.cc/qBwFKSvW/Thief.png)
![The Brute: Can break stone with their fist | Natural armor | Deals more damage to mobs with 50+ health and less damage to mobs with 10- health | Can't use a shield | Can't naturally regenerate health unless they're sprinting](https://i.postimg.cc/ZqH71Z7V/Brute.png)
![Q&A: Q: "Will you port RPG Origins to forge?" A: It’s already supported, but only on Modrinth. | Q:  "Can I put RPG Origins in my modpack?" A: Sure! I'm always thankful when people add my mods to their modpacks. | Q: "Can you port to the ____ Minecraft version?" A: Every Version is already supported, but only on Modrinth. On Curseforge, I will continuously update to the latest version and the 2 versions behind it. (ex: 1.19, 1.18, and 1.17)](https://i.postimg.cc/W3f918PZ/Q-A.png)
[![Bisect Hosting Ad](https://www.bisecthosting.com/partners/custom-banners/fd8a9cc1-8ee4-4e1f-b613-cb30a99d2f3b.webp)](https://bisecthosting.com/Sir_BananaCat)

<details>
    <summary>Image Transcriptions</summary>
    The Knight: Always takes half a heart less damage | Deals 10% more damage | Starts with a shield | Gets Hungry Faster


The Mage: Immune to poison, weakness, and slowness | Ability to walk on water while holding a heart of the sea | Fireball spell (Primary Button) | Less attack damage | 3 fewer heats


The Cleric: Permanent hero of the village | Regeneration, speed, jump boost, and strength last 50% longer | Heal pool ability (primary Button) | Can't get bad omen | 3 fewer hearts


The Mage: Immune to poison, weakness, and slowness | Ability to walk on water while holding a heart of the sea | Fireball spell (Primary Button) | Less attack damage | 3 fewer heats



The Bard | 1.19+ Only: Can do special things with goat horns, each one is different | Starts with a goat horn | Runs faster when at low health | Gets hungry faster | Gains less XP


The Thief: Permanent swiftness I | Invisible to players and mobs while crouching, can't deal damage during and 3 seconds after crouching | When killing a villager you steal 3 emeralds | Starts a raid when they kill an iron golem | 2 fewer hearts | Can't use a shield


The Brute: Can break stone with their fist | Natural armor | Deals more damage to mobs with 50+ health and less damage to mobs with 10- health | Can't use a shield | Can't naturally regenerate health unless they're sprinting


Q&A:

Q: "Will you port RPG Origins to forge?" 

A: It’s already supported, but only on Modrinth.


Q:  "Can I put RPG Origins in my modpack?"

A: Sure! I'm always thankful when people add my mods to their modpacks.


Q: "Can you port to the ____ Minecraft version?"

A: Every Version is already supported, but only on modrinth.
On Curseforge, I will continuously update to the latest version and the 2 versions behind it. (ex: 1.19, 1.18, and 1.17)
</details>
*Note: This mod requires Origins and will not work without it*
meta.name: RPG Origins
